A successful program isn't determined
translation.es: Un programa exitoso no depende de cuántos campeonatos ganes.

translation.es: pero nuestro objetivo es salvar una vida en cada temporada.

translation.en: The Saints have saved my kid.
translation.es: Los Saints salvaron a mi hijo.

translation.en: Because my son did have a lot of self- esteem issues.
translation.es: Porque mi hijo tenía muchos problemas de autoestima.

translation.en: And he didn't know what he wanted to do

translation.en: until he met the Saints.

And it's really not like that.
I'm the king of this ship.

Nice!

They used to leave the schools open for activities.

translation.en: Three claps and a salute.
Salute you, salute the Saints, salute your parents.

translation.es: Él les hace creer que pueden hacer cualquier cosa y ser lo que quieran.

translation.es: Hay que seguir ejercitándote. Será un gran año para ti. Tenemos que prepararte.

Look how far your brother's knee is bent.
Get it bent, then you put this foot back to where it's comfortable.

- Watch your hands right here. Go ahead. - Put your hands up.

let's bring our programs up and let's get to it.

translation.es: De niño, armaba rompecabezas. Y no de los normales.

translation.en: Big puzzles. Like 100- piece puzzles, he's like four or five years old.
translation.es: Sino grandes, de cien piezas, cuando tenía cuatro o cinco años.

translation.es: Ni siquiera miraba la imagen. Tomaba las fichas y, por sus formas,

translation.es: sabía dónde iba cada pieza. Ni siquiera miraba la caja.

translation.es: es casi la misma sensación que cuando anota un touchdown.

What's good, Bubba? How you doing, good?
Everything cool?

translation.en: - Thank you. I appreciate you. - No problem.
translation.es: - Gracias - Gracias a ti. No hay problema.

translation.en: All this… All this is my stomping grounds.
translation.es: Todo esto… Este es mi terreno.

translation.en: My mother was raising six kids in a two- bedroom apartment.
translation.es: Mi madre crió a seis hijos en dos habitaciones.

translation.en: Uh, she did wonderful work, what she did with us.
translation.es: Hizo un trabajo maravilloso con nosotros.

translation.en: Never been to college. I don't know what college is. I never graduated high school.
translation.es: No sé lo que es una universidad. Nunca me gradué de la secundaria.

translation.en: I never got a chance to walk across the stage and pick up a diploma.
translation.es: No tuve la oportunidad de subir a una tarima a recibir un diploma.

translation.en: None of that. I wasn't into that.
translation.es: Nada de eso. Eso no me gustaba.

translation.en: I was, um… young and lost in life. I was reckless.
translation.es: Era joven y me sentía perdido. Fui descuidado.

translation.en: Um, I didn't think of graduating school and all, getting a GED, or none of that.
translation.es: No pensé en graduarme ni en certificarme ni en nada de eso.

translation.en: We can't stay in the past. We got to learn from our mistakes
translation.es: Hay que superar el pasado, y aprender de los errores.

translation.en: 'cause if you don't learn from your mistakes, you're just gonna be lost in the system and that's what the system wants.
translation.es: Si no, vas a estar perdido en el sistema, y eso es lo que el sistema quiere.

translation.en: The system wants us to be lost and…
translation.es: El sistema quiere que estemos perdidos para seguir dominando

translation.en: So they can continue to conquer and keep us divided, and…
translation.es: El sistema quiere que estemos perdidos para seguir dominando y dividiéndonos, y…

translation.en: We greater than that.
To be a coach is a lot.
'Cause when you a coach, the world puts you on a pedestal that…
translation.es: Porque el mundo te pone en un pedestal,

translation.en: They look at you as a perfection person.
translation.es: y te ven como una persona perfecta.

translation.en: And I'm far from… I'm far from perfect. I'm far from a role model.
translation.es: Y yo estoy lejos de ser perfecto. No soy un modelo a seguir.

translation.en: I'm a human being. I make mistakes. I have mistakes. I do get stressed.
translation.es: Soy un ser humano. Cometo errores. Me estreso.

translation.es: Tengo mis propios problemas en la vida, e intento mantenerlos al margen, pero a veces me pasan factura.

translation.en: I try to keep it separate, but once in a while, it catches up to me.

translation.en: So I just feed off the energy they give me and try to make a positive out of it.
translation.es: Yo intento cargarme con la energía que me dan y sacar algo positivo.

- That's called communication. - I know.
translation.es: - Eso se llama comunicación. - Lo sé.

translation.en: That's how you communicate amongst your brothers.
translation.es: Así te comunicas con tus hermanos.

translation.en: - What if we're separated? - Listen. Shh! This is why we're camping.
translation.es: - ¿Y si estamos lejos? - Escucha. Por eso acampamos.

translation.en: So we can get a bond and we can be brothers.
translation.es: Para unirnos más, y ser hermanos,

translation.en: - We can communicate better. - Is there any water?
So when it comes game time… Give me a second.
translation.es: Para que a la hora del partido… Espera.

translation.en: Comes game time, and coach relays a message to Miguel
translation.es: A la hora del partido, cuando el entrenador le dé un mensaje a Miguel

translation.en: and Miguel relays it to the rest of the team,
translation.es: y Miguel lo transmita al resto del equipo, nuestra comunicación sea excelente

translation.en: our communication is up to par and we know what we got to do,
translation.es: y Miguel lo transmita al resto del equipo, nuestra comunicación sea excelente y sepamos qué hacer, como equipo. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: - as one team. Is that understood? - Yes, coach.
translation.es: y sepamos qué hacer, como equipo. ¿Entendido? Sí, entrenador.

translation.en: - How many packs you had? - What?
- How many packs of chips you had? - Two.
Two? We're only supposed to get one.
Oh, yeah. Yeah, I only had one.
- Give me my phone back. - Oh, good. It's that one again.
translation.es: Ah, bueno. Es esa otra vez.

translation.en: Kodak!
I do not care what's the circumstance.
You do not touch nobody's child out here.
translation.es: No puedes tocar al hijo de nadie aquí.

translation.en: - Do you got me? - Yes.
You wanna put your hands on somebody,
you go pick up a brick and throw it at a tree.
translation.es: toma un ladrillo y tíralo a un árbol.

translation.en: I wasn't gonna touch him.
It's just that he took my phone and I was trying to get it back.
translation.es: Es que tomó mi teléfono y lo estaba recuperando.

translation.en: Okay, come to Coach Gawuala. Let Coach Gawuala deal with it. Got it?
translation.es: Entonces debes buscarme, y dejar que yo me encargue. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: Anything you need, if you feel opposite, you feel like you gotta scream,
translation.es: Cualquier cosa que necesites, si te sientes mal, si sientes que quieres gritar, ven a buscarme primero.

translation.en: you come to Coach Gawuala first.
translation.es: si sientes que quieres gritar, ven a buscarme primero.

translation.en: If we have to scream together, we'll do it together,
translation.es: Si tenemos que gritar juntos, lo haremos.

translation.en: - is that understood? - Yes, coach.
Give me my three.
Easy. I love you.
Go help your brothers out.
- Thank you. - Okay.
How many guys is having fun? Raise your hand.
translation.es: Levanten la mano si se están divirtiendo.

translation.en: We brought you guys camping
for the simple fact y'all played a wonderful game.
translation.es: por el simple hecho de que jugaron maravillosamente.

translation.en: Y'all starting to understand football. Y'all starting to have fun in football.
translation.es: Empiezan a entender el fútbol. Empiezan a divertirse con él.

translation.en: So we decided to bring you guys camping to enjoy the time out here.
translation.es: Decidimos traerlos a acampar para que disfruten su tiempo aquí.

translation.en: How many guys heard cop cars driving past just now?
You heard a cop car drove past here?
- Mm- mmm. - No.
- Did you say a cop car? - That's the difference.
How many guys seen police drive past here or heard an ambulance drive through here?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos vieron policías o una ambulancia por aquí?

translation.en: Nobody, right? This is why we do this.
So we can take you out of your everyday environment.
translation.es: Para sacarlos de su entorno diario.

translation.en: How many of you guys feel free right now? Raise your hand.
translation.es: ¿Cuántos se sienten libres ahora? Levanten la mano.

translation.en: Good. That's telling me
translation.es: Bien. Eso me dice que nadie está pensando en cosas

translation.en: nobody's thinking about anything back home that they shouldn't be thinking about.
translation.es: Eso me dice que nadie está pensando en cosas en las que no debe estar pensando.

translation.en: I don't coach football for wins and losses.
translation.es: No enseño fútbol para ganar o perder.

translation.en: I coach football to teach you young guys how to be young men,
translation.es: Enseño fútbol para enseñarles a ser jóvenes,

translation.en: and when you become your own men,
translation.es: y a que cuando sean adultos

translation.en: how to be a stronger man and stand tall on your own two feet.
I love you guys like you're my own child.
translation.es: Lo quiero como si fueran mis propios hijos.

translation.en: Love you, too.  Love you, too.
Y'all know my big motto. Who love you?
translation.es: Ya conocen mi lema. ¿Quién los quiere?

translation.en: - You! Coach Gawuala. - Who love me?
- Me. Us. - Who love you?
- Coach Gawuala. - Who love me?
Us.
Good job, guys.
Y'all can go have fun.
Every year starts a new Cinderella story.
translation.es: Cada año hay una nueva historia de Cenicienta.

translation.en: The Cinderella story never stays the same. There's just a new one every year.
translation.es: La historia nunca es la misma. Hay una nueva cada año.

translation.en: It's always beautiful. It's always beautiful.
That desire to have that championship,
translation.es: El deseo de tener ese campeonato,

translation.en: to be on that stage and say you're a national champion.
translation.es: de subir al escenario y decir que eres campeón nacional

translation.en: It's a chase every year.
translation.es: es un anhelo de cada año.

translation.en: Everybody goes through trials and tribulations, everybody has to experience things different.
translation.es: Todos tienen sus desafíos, todos viven las cosas diferentemente.

translation.en: Keeping them off the street, focused at school, disciplined in the home,
translation.es: Mantenerlos lejos de la calle, enfocados en la escuela y en casa

translation.en: will ensure that they become positive men as they get older.
translation.es: garantizará que sean hombres de bien.

translation.en: And that's our goal.
It's time to go to work, gentlemen. - Let's go. - Don't be offside.
translation.es: Hora de ir a trabajar, caballeros. Vamos.

translation.en: The game's not all about strength and speed and all of that.
translation.es: El juego no se trata solo de fuerza, velocidad y todo eso.

translation.en: Probably like 5% of each.
It's all about being wise,
and connecting with all of your teammates.
translation.es: y conectar con todos tus compañeros.

translation.en: It's like the coaches.
They see what you can do,
translation.es: Ellos ven lo que puedes hacer,

translation.en: but yourself, you don't know what you can do.
translation.es: pero tú solo no sabes lo que puedes hacer.

translation.en: Eleven, twelve, thirteen…
When Coach Gawuala said that this is your year, I was like,
translation.es: Cuando el entrenador Gawuala dijo que este será nuestro año, pensé:

translation.en: This really is my year. I can shine.
translation.es: Este realmente es mi año. Puedo brillar.

translation.en: I'm just out here doing my thing. Do what I have to do.
translation.es: Solo haré lo mío. Haré lo que tengo que hacer.

translation.en: It's gonna be exciting. It's gonna be something never seen before.
translation.es: Será emocionante. Será algo nunca antes visto.

translation.en: - Who the show? - We the show!
- Am I my brother's keeper? - You already know! - Am I my brother's keeper? - You already know!
translation.es: - ¿Cuidamos el uno al otro? - ¡Ya lo sabes!

translation.en: Number one rule today is to have fun. Is that understood?
translation.es: - La regla número uno es divertirse. - ¡Sí!

translation.en: All I wanna do is have fun.
translation.es: No importa qué pase. Solo hay que divertirse. ¿Sí?

translation.en: - Is that understood? - Yes, coach!
translation.es: No importa qué pase. Solo hay que divertirse. ¿Sí? ¡Sí!

translation.en: - Rule number one is to do what? - Have fun! - To do what? - Have fun!
I love every last one of you guys.
translation.es: Los quiero a todos y a…

translation.en: Let's go, Brooklyn, let's go!
This one's gonna be epic.
I put my life on the line for this one.
translation.es: Me juego la vida por esto.

translation.en: - - Go!
Ready… go!
